meaningMnemonic: The <radical>dirt</radical> <radical>mask</radical> is a mask which, when put on, will greatly <kanji>increase</kanji> the amount of dirt.
readingMnemonic: Use the dirt mask to <kanji>increase</kanji> the dirt around you. The <reading>zo</reading>mbies (ぞう) are trying to escape, so you just keep increasing the dirt on top of them so they can't get out.
